text: I dunno, Thanksgiving just got more interesting
I feel like that would make for an aweful prank, half the food is really what you think it is, half the food is tofurky, and megetables. Nobody wins in that scenario.
guess you’re right there. A lot more turkey’s get pardon’d this year, just by people being goofy with faux meats.

> I feel like that would make for an aweful prank, half the food is really what you think it is, half the food is tofurky, and megetables. Nobody wins in that scenario.

Or the vegetables are all megetables and the meat is all plant based. Bizzaro Thanksgiving ftw!
